column5: A very well written article by Terry Curtis in regards to no fishing in the Town of Cobourg.  I hope everyone has July 1st open on their calendar, I know where I am fishing that day. Perhaps send him an email yourself as well in support of this.     The whole article is right here: Wake up folks, and smell the fish  Cheers, Ron...
it's starting to snow ball  I hear next week you are on the Ellen show
Sure July 1st I think I know where I will be and I wish it was fishing with you Ron but I will be headed the other way.  Good luck with the fight
You owe me a rye and ginger,and a new key board Terry.  Stay strong Ron. Good on ya.

I'll be down there for canada day. I'll bring the rods with me. I'm sure I won't have to twist the kids arms to do some fishing while we're there  What am I fishing for? Just need to know what set ups to bring  S.
This is great. Wish I could make it, but every long weekend is a family camping trip up north.
Great to hear that people are taking notice!!! Awesome Ron. Cheers
I'll be there with my 5 yr old as well Ron.
Cool! I'll bring Wyatt too!  S.
